sentences.english: Please have me spayed or neutered, so that I can be even healthier.
sentences.chinese: 别忘了给我做节育手术，这样我会更健康。

sentences.english: Place the IUD can cause menorrhagia or uterine bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 放置节育环会引起月经过多或子宫出血。

sentences.english: Today, my boyfriend of five years gave me an information packet on Nuva-ring.
sentences.chinese: 今天在一起五年的男朋友给了我一张节育环的宣传单。

sentences.english: These indicated the IUD was safe.
sentences.chinese: 提示该宫内节育器是安全的。

sentences.english: The related factors in two groups pregnancy women were compared.
sentences.chinese: 比较两组带宫内节育器妊娠相关因素上的差异。

sentences.english: Are your current pet(s) spayed or neutered?
sentences.chinese: 你现有的宠物是否有做节育？

sentences.english: Abortion is legal in China and is widely used as a birth-control method.
sentences.chinese: 堕胎是合法的，并且它被作为一种节育手段广泛应用。

sentences.english: This is also a great time to discuss birth control and when and how to discontinue it.
sentences.chinese: 这时候也可以谈谈节育以及停止节育的事情。

sentences.english: This is also a great time to discuss birth control and when and how to discontinue it.
sentences.chinese: 这时候也可以谈谈节育以及停止节育的事情。

sentences.english: The pill is the choice of most women, followed by condoms and sterilisation.
sentences.chinese: 多数女人选择避孕药，次之是安全套和内置节育器。

sentences.english: Conclusion Further focus monitoring on orthopedic implants and IUD should be strengthen.
sentences.chinese: 结论应进一步加强骨科植入物和宫内节育器的监测。

sentences.english: The wife took off birth control annulus, the hope wants a child, but for a long time is infecund .
sentences.chinese: 妻子拿掉了节育环，希望要个孩子，可是久久不孕。

sentences.english: In fairness, while IUDs were dangerous, so was pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 公平地讲，怀孕与宫内节育器同样危险。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the limitation of ultrasonic detection on prevenception utensil .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨超声在宫内节育器观察上的局限性。

sentences.english: Sterilization operations shall ensure the safety of those to whom the operations are performed.
sentences.chinese: 实施避孕节育手术，应当保证受术者的安全。

sentences.english: Mirena, the progestogen coil, is the Rolls-Royce of contraception for women this age.
sentences.chinese: 宫内节育器曼月乐是这个年龄的女人避孕的最佳选择。

definition: to be infertile/to have no offspring
